entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , L'Islet

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
